help-file.title: "CONTINUAL LIGHT"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <object> | <Room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Temporary in Rooms, Permanent on items Type of spell: Enchantment
"Continual Light" allows the spell caster to enchant an item by granting it its own light, making it a permanent light source. Not specifying an object causes the whole room to be temporarily lit by a magical light.
